titleStmt.title: An assize-sermon preach'd at St. Edmunds-Bury in Suffolk March the 23rd, 1696/7 before the Right Honourable Sir John Holt, Knight, lord chief justice of the King's Bench, and John Packe, Esq., high sheriff for the county / by Thomas Knaggs ...
titleStmt.author: Knaggs, Thomas, 1660 or 1-1724.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
